title: Evelynn can have HUGE sexual references, But Katarina Can't have a Go Go Pole?

embed.description: Note: This is a teaser! Purchase RP here and help support this channel via the amazon affiliate program (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO Skin name is confirmed as "Slay Belle Katarina" previously dubbed as "Xmas Katarina", particles & SFX may not be final. Full Skin Spotlight will be released in the near future which will go more indepth.

body:
YES I am bringing this issue back.

While I was looking at the Evelynn update I felt that she was really well done. Her concept was hit well and the point was made that she is suppose to be this succubus that feeds off of the pain and torment her victims feel.  Then I started to listen to her V/O and special interactions and felt confused. The actress and sounds themselves were fine, I just felt that the lines themselves were quite mature.

Now I have no problems with it, its fine to me, but (to those who don't know I put the link in the post) A few Years ago when Slay Belle Katarina was released, her recall was initially a candy cane go-go pole. Then Morello came on to say that it was too much and changed it to her chopping the candy cane pole in half (this is one of the lamest recalls on a skin in a long time in my opinion, but that's besides the point) another point later was made saying "It didn't match her character". Really? That's the excuse? I could name SO many skins that were released where the recalls don't match the character AT ALL. It's a fun skin, that's the point. Look at Moo Cow Alistar, would Alistar, a giant Minotaur wear a cow suit and feed Maokai's cats? NO! But it's funny! It's Great! So I kinda feel the excuse of it not fitting with the character was a cop out. Same with Singed turning into a giant bee, Or Braum elbow dropping a chair (since hes suppose to be a protector/defender) Or better yet, would a war leader who wants to feed her boar with the blood of her victims, ride a giant poro with her recall being her playing with the poro. I'm not against any of these skins, in fact these are some of the best skins in the game.  

But it's okay for Eve to have these blatant sexual references (and whore insults to Ahri)  but a go go pole is too much?

replies.body: Nidalee's dance got nerfed when she got updated though.

She used to only spin around the pole. 

Now she spins around, rubs her tits and down it, and rubs her legs along it.
You call this nerfed? https://youtu.be/JkspuRQfUDQ?t=16s?noredirect
Maybe their standards have changed over the years? Slay Belle was made so long ago, so it wouldn't be surprising if Riot is more lax about these things now.

Exactly this. Ever since Kled came out, you can tell that Riot has become far more loose, and actually embracing that Teen rating.

Besides, alot of the sexual innuendos that Evelynn has are basically the same thing you'd find in children's cartoons. Not directly implying what she is implying, but enough so that anyone mature enough can easily understand it, but it will simply fly right over any child's head. The farthest she goes is "I like to go naked", but that's about it. I doubt kids will ask their parents "Where will Void Staff go?", and if they do, it's a question they can easily dodge.

Kat dancing on a pole, however.........that's probably pushing it too far. Kids won't understand what would be happening, and ask what is going on. It would be a question much harder to dodge without blatantly lying, which would make some parents feel bad.

Except it doesn't fit the character?

Evelynn is meant to be a sexual character. She is a seductress afterall.
Katarina on the other hand is a Noxian high command and Assassin.
She has no reason to be riding a pole.

Besides the new recall is way better. 

The skin is called "**SLAY** Belle" not "Slut Belle" 

It make more sense for her to be Slaying something over riding it.

Katarina doesn't seduce men to 'lower their guard'. 
When has she ever done that? Wait I know the answer. Literally never.

As for her wearing a 'slutty' outfit, the only thing that would make it that is the fact she is showing her tits.
Which doesn't immediately make her 'slutty'

So your saying you couldn't see her plafully on a pole at like a christmas party?

I could.

Noxus doesn't really seem like a "Christmas Party" kinda place.

More like a, "We just butchered an entire small village let's celebrate by bathing in their blood and drinking booze" kinda place.
Who says the two are mutually exclusive? Maybe they celebrate Christmas the "Noxian" way?
Bathing in Pine tree blood?

Eve's rework is fucking fantastic. Why in the world would I do that?

And I'd never threaten to quit league because I genuinely enjoy the game for it's gameplay and I have a lot of friends I enjoy playing with.

New Evelynn is a perfect example of positive sexualization.
The old Slay Belle Katarina was a pretty good example of shit sexualization.

Katarina.... is a noxian assassin. That's kinda it. She really doesn't have actual sex appeal to her character/personality (besides her character model being a bit sexual but that's about it).

Didn't really fit for Katarina. 

I honestly don't care either way, but it makes sense why it was removed.

It doesn't match her character is actually correct. She's not meant to be a "sexy" character, like nidalee or evelynn. There's huge differences. I love Eve, but you guys are grasping at everything "sexy" you can get now. Tone down boner town. Thanks. <3
Why do you keep calling it a go-go pole...? Is the word 'stripper' censored?
because pole dancing isn't exclusive to strippers
Because strippers use go go poles?

Technically, it's because Katarina isn't _supposed_ to be about sex and seduction.

In reality? League Of Legends's** entire female cast** used to be about sex and seduction, back in the days.

Then times changed, Riot realized they were really overdoing it, and we've got variety and female characters that weren't first and foremost designed around their sexuality (regardless of wether they were supposed to be cold assassins, wind spirits, or mages).

Unfortunately, and as I have already pointed it out, it feels as if Riot returned to what they did originally: all female characters focused on having sex appeal. Evelynn's release made all the sexist guys come out from their hole. Since Evelynn's announcements, they feel enabled, so I've seen a spawn of people claiming that women don't play videogames anyway and asking for more sexualization of the female cast.

I am afraid Riot went full-circle and returned to the sexist female design. So perhaps Katarina will return to pole-dance. This makes me really sad, because one of the things I love the most about Riot was how they embraced variety and equality over time. But I can't help it if Riot has decided to change....
you do realize Evelynn's theme hasn't actually changed right? She has literally ALWAYS been a sexy sadist.

If your a women warrior and dont use your sexiness as a tool your a fool unless your a front line fighter like kayle or sej.

Even a moments hesitation is life or death on a battlefield just a flash of tit could easily distract even the hardiest of warrior.

Also why do sexy characters bother you? I asked my wife but shes secure in her femininity and said they could be naked for all she cared it wouldnt bother her... Then she yelled (okay slightly scolded) at me for spending too much on "princess dresses" (what she calls leauge skins ^-^)

So does it make you feel inadequate? Because male movie stars with arms bigger than my thighs and a 8 pack make me feel inadequate but i just shrug it off.

I don't think sexy characters bother them in the slightest.

They're just saying having all of the league females being sexy is boorish. 

Variety is fun and Equality is nice.

But the female chars arent for them... its for the males.

I mean power fantasy or even just fantasys exist for a reason.

Do you think skyrim would have been as popular if instead of being a dragonborn who can stop time by yelling at it if you were a dockworker imstead and the whole game was about moving crates?

You cant even say "well what if a woman wants to be a normal woman" cuz i say turn off the game then. BOOM your a normal boring woman.

I mean women have been using their sexiness since the start of civilization (prostitution).

No one wants to play a normal person. (Yes i know about not speaking in absolutes but when its like 98% to 2% it might as well be true.)

Im simply comfused as to WHY they have a problem with all females being portrayed as sexy.
So much wrong with this comment I don't even think I want to tackle this. It speaks for itself, really.

Kek couldn't even get past the first sentence? I debated deleting it.

Okay heres a better one.

"They're just saying having all of the league females being sexy is boorish"

What else could they be? Explain to me WHY its borish?

 You want riot to lose a good bit of profit just cause?

You want men to stop finding women attractive?

WHAT DO YOU WANT????????

Think of it like this. A bland female wouldnt alienate women but it would quite a bit of men.

Wheras a sexy female would only alienate a small percentage of males and females therfore it makes more sense to just make everything sexy because thats where the vast majority of the player base is okay with.

Please.

Please stop.

This is so nonsensical that it genuinely hurts to read.

Not even asking you how is Rek'Sai or Kalista a "bland" female.

I can only reply with this; that you just provided the example of what I wrote above:


> Since Evelynn's announcements, they feel enabled, so I've seen a spawn of people claiming that women don't play videogames anyway and asking for more sexualization of the female cast.

What? That doesn't remotly answer anything i said?

Where did i say women dont play games? Its a good 50-50 maybe 40-60 since leauge is so toxic.

And i was simply asking why women were against sexualization? And what they wanted in turn.

But i see you dont know what they actually want (you a guy? If so my bad) so ill leave you be.

To answer your point - it's not difficult, what me an many other people want is variety. Simply put, for every Evelynn there can be a Rek'Sai, for every Elise there should be a Taliyah.

We want the same variety the male cast has (look at the physical differences between Gragas, Sion, Singed and Ezreal!). Some hot women, some not sexualized women.

There are even some girls who want to play characters like Ahri or Evelynn. They find a certain empowerment in playing a character that everyone desires. It's not like sexy babes cannot exist, because as much as I don't like them, many others will.

Even so, what you obtain when a videogame is **all** oversexualized babes and **nothing else**, what you obtain is that you put off a lot of girls who feel like the game doesn't expect to be played by them too.

League Of Legends isn't like that, thankfully. It's a game with characters ranging from Illaoi to Evelynn. I just want League to keep being like this.
